item.description:
Barbara Waldorf, the managing director of the EnlightenNext Boston Center was going to present at our next meeting.....Plans have changed a bit...EnlightenNext was so pleased by this opportunity, they offered to have Jeff Carreira come to give the presentation. Jeff Carreira is EnlightenNext's Director of Education, and has been Andrew Cohen's personal assistant for over six years. He created
and designed an introductory course on Cohen's teachings of Evolutionary Enlightenment that is being taught literally all over the world (www.eecourse.org). He also produced a 10 day international teacher training course for the course, and continues to create new curriculum to communicate and teach people how to practically apply the transformative power of Evolutionary Enlightenment.
Don't miss this meeting!!! This meeting will be at Samadhi in Newton.
Hope to see you!
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group February Meetup
